message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What are your thoughts on this?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This is my final offer.
I understand that you're trying to get a fair price, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
